casebody.data:
STATE of Connecticut
v.
Angel MORALES Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided December 21, 2017

Melissa L. Streeto, senior assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

John L. Cordani, Jr., assigned counsel, and Damian K. Gunningsmith, assigned counsel, in support of the petition.

The defendant's petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 172 Conn. App. 329, 160 A.3d 383 (2017), is denied.

MULLINS, J., did not participate in the consideration of or decision on this petition.
